welcome_message_body: Welcome to the charming city of Saint-Julien-en-Genevois, known for its beautiful scenery and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Bon voyage!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geneve-cointrin Airport handles all international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Terminal 1 is exclusively used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 serves as a hub for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Annemasse Airport, handling all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Annecy-Meythe Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
